long_description: The lightest, most compact cookware system that MSR offers, the Quick(TM) Solo is the solution for simple, one-pot meals on your backpacking adventures in the mountains. Cookset includes 1.3-liter pot, strainer lid, 1 insulated mug and a pot handle. 1.3-liter aluminum hard-anodized pot spreads heat evenly for good cooking performance and excellent durability. Brushed aluminum lid features an integrated strainer to eliminate the hassle of draining water from noodles or steamed vegetables. Talon(TM) pot handle attaches to and removes from the pot via an exterior bracket, ensuring you don't scratch the inner surface. 12.5 fl. oz. insulated mug keeps your drinks hot and easy to handle; includes a sip-through lid. Mug nests inside the pot for efficient packing.
short_description: The lightest, most compact cookware system that MSR offers, the Quick(TM) Solo is the solution for simple, one-pot meals on your backpacking adventures in the mountains.
